txt.en: You have selected Burdy as your favourite to win
The race has begun! Betting is now closed
Burdy has won the race!
You have a vested interest in Burdy's success as he runs the Summer Festival tasting race.
Burdy has lost the race
Burdy has lost the race
Burdy has lost the race
You have left the race area

'Good day to you, my good [placeholder]! Are you here to watch the Taste of Hobbiton? It is a tremendously exciting event that we hold here every summer. Food is brought from all over the Shire, and our four speedy contestants must compete to see how quickly they can sample each bit of vittles!

'Here is a bit of inside information, if you'll be wanting it: Burdy Gamwich is a sure thing this year. I happen to know that he eats eleven full meals per day! And he is only just out of his tweens and is active as a young hobbit-lad can be.

'I'd say the race can end with none other than young Burdy coming out on top. Would you like to place your confidence in his winning the event? I am sure there will be a great prize in it for you if you guess rightly.'
Tickets for the race can be collected at the Taste of Hobbiton event during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou will need to hand over a Festival Ticket in order to select Burdy as your favourite to win.
'Well done, [placeholder]! I hear you had some excellent luck with your guess at the outcome of the Taste of Hobbiton. Allow me to offer my congratulations and this respectable reward!'
The Taste of Hobbiton can be observed during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou should watch the Taste of Hobbiton and see if Burdy Gamwich wins the race as you supposed.
Bando Brandybuck can be found at the Taste of Hobbiton.\n\nYou should speak with Bando Brandybuck to collect your prize.
'My goodness! Watch the race, [placeholder]; it is far more interesting than me. Burdy will do splendidly, I am sure!'
'Burdy is your favourite is he? Well then, hand me one of your Festival Tickets, and I'll mark your wager on him.\n\n'Good luck, [placeholder]!'
'Sorry, [placeholder]. I'm afraid you'll need a Festival Ticket in order to select a contestant.\n\n'Dodder Twofoot is handing out tickets just near here. I'd go see him right away!'
Turn in a Festival Ticket to select Burdy
Observe the race to see if Burdy is victorious
Talk to Bando Brandybuck
Do not leave the race area
The Taste of Hobbiton: Bustle with Burdy
